channel.title: Posts on QuizInk - The e-magazine
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on QuizInk - The e-magazine

item.title: Rogue Planets - What are they Really?
item.description: “As a kid, I would count backwards from ten and imagine at one, there would be an explosion—perhaps caused by a rogue planet crashing into Earth or some other major catastrophe.” -Lang Leav

item.title: Should we all be using Signal?
item.description: “There are two types of encryption: one that will prevent your sister from reading your diary and one that will prevent your government.” -Bruce Schneier

item.title: Planned Obsolescence and the Batterygate Lawsuit
item.description: “From cell phones to household appliances and clothing to automobile tires, some products we use every day could last much longer. But they don’t."

item.title: E.T. vs The Alien: 25 years on the mystery still continues
item.description: “Not to have seen the cinema of Ray means existing in the world without seeing the sun or the moon” – Akira Kurosowa
